content.question: If <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="a does not equal 0"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>a</mi><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWGHbGaeyiyIKRaaGimaaaa@397D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> , then <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the limit as x approaches a of open parentheses x squared minus a squared close parentheses divided by open parentheses x to the power of x minus a to the power of x close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <munder> <mrow> <mi>lim</mi></mrow> <mrow> <mi>x</mi><mo>→</mo><mi>a</mi></mrow> </munder> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><msup> <mi>a</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>4</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><msup> <mi>a</mi> <mn>4</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaCbeaeaaqa aaaaaaaaWdbiGacYgacaGGPbGaaiyBaaWcpaqaa8qacaWG4bGaeyOK H4QaamyyaaWdaeqaaOWdbmaalaaapaqaa8qacaWG4bWdamaaCaaale qabaWdbiaaikdaaaGccqGHsislcaWGHbWdamaaCaaaleqabaWdbiaa ikdaaaaak8aabaWdbiaadIhapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGinaaaaki abgkHiTiaadggapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGinaaaaaaaaaa@4767@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> is

choices.label: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="1 divided by a squared"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mrow> <msup> <mi>a</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaamyya8aadaahaaWcbeqa a8qacaaIYaaaaaaaaaa@390D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="1 divided by open parentheses 2 times a squared close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mrow> <mn>2</mn><msup> <mi>a</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaiaadggapaWaaWba aSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaaaaaaaa@39C9@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="1 divided by open parentheses 6 times a squared close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mrow> <mn>6</mn><msup> <mi>a</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOnaiaadggapaWaaWba aSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaaaaaaaa@39CD@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

content.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="1 divided by open parentheses 2 times a squared close parentheses"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mrow> <mn>2</mn><msup> <mi>a</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaaGOmaiaadggapaWaaWba aSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaaaaaaaa@39C9@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the classification of a given expression (e.g., Use the chain rule to find the derivative of a composite function).
